cons:
- Hard to align incentives of different teams. Teams are very specialised, and one project typically include many internal/ 3rd party vendors, and they all have different priorities. So one project can hardly progress according to its planned timeline
- Broken data pipeline because systems are in migration all the time, which increases dependency on other teams and you return to problems in above point
- Unclear career ladder. My department only has junior and senior level and the gap between these two levels are big and hard to define + project delivery is very slow, there seems no decently quick track to progress to higher position
- Salary is not competitive for data roles (of course this depends on your team, this is just what I’m having now!)
